ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q, r : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) r Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM r".

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q Unable to unify "canonical A0 eqA ltM q" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

ctx: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduce Q p q H : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) IHHreduce : canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) Unable to unify "nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)" with "canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)".

original: intros Q p q Hreduce Hcanon. induction Hreduce. - inversion Hcanon. apply H2. - apply IHHreduce. + auto. + inversion Hcanon. apply H1. + inversion Hcanon. apply H3.
